article.title: SAIC Awarded $25 Million Contract by Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has received a contract by the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) to help develop an affordable alternative to petroleum-derived jet fuel (JP-8) from agricultural and aquacultural feedstock materials. The contract has a total value of up to $25 million.
